enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Level of Emissions for the Base Year of Croatia: Jim Penman (UK) reported that informal consultations had resulted in agreement on this matter (FCCC/SBI/2005/L.3).
Chair Becker thanked Jim Penman for his work in resolving this longstanding issue.
SBI agreed to forward the draft decision to the COP.
